EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_CF Summit Europe_Basel_Q418.CF Summit EU Basel Booth Visitor Email
EmailTemplate.subject: It was great to see you last week at CF Summit! Let’s get to work.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for taking the time to meet in person with our team. Hopefully you had an opportunity to talk to your peers going through the same journey, attend some sessions on transformation as well as some deep dives into new features on PCF. After last week, you should feel energized with new ways to help you deliver exceptional user experiences. Give Pivotal Cloud Foundry a try by signing up for a free trial of Pivotal Web Services <[[https://run.pivotal.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-cf-summit-europe-basel-q418]]>, and get started on modernizing existing software by partnering with us on Application Transformation <[[https://pivotal.io/application-transformation?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-cf-summit-europe-basel-q418]]>.
Looking for more content? Check out these resources or share them with your team:
- Running .NET apps on Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/the-one-true-platform-for-all-net-workloads-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-cf-summit-europe-basel-q418]]> - Run Kubernetes with Pivotal Container Service <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/pivotal-container-service?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-cf-summit-europe-basel-q418]]> - Check out the latest customer case studies <[[http://pivotal.io/customers?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-cf-summit-europe-basel-q418]]> and watch this inspiring SpringOne Platform keynote from Rabobank <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/rabobank-vincent-oostindie?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-cf-summit-europe-basel-q418]]>
Also, all the talks from CF Summit will be available online in the next week, in the meantime, you can watch all of the sessions <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1ezNJvajUU0&list=PLAdzTan_eSPQsR_aqYBQxpYTEQZnjhTN6]]> from our recently concluded SpringOne Platform.
- The Pivotal Team
